00101 /* zero an array */
00102 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00104 /* number of elements in one triangle of a square matrix of order n */
00105 #define PACKED_LENGTH(n)   ((n) * ((n) + 1))/2

00107 /* duplicate the slot with name given by sym from src to dest */
00108 
00109 #define slot_dup(dest, src, sym)  SET_SLOT(dest, sym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(src, sym)))
00110 
00111 /* is not yet used: */
00112 #define slot_nonNull_dup(dest, src, sym)                        \
00113     if(GET_SLOT(src, sym) != R_NilValue)                        \
00114         SET_SLOT(dest, sym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(src, sym)))

00121 #define uplo_P(_x_) CHAR(STRING_ELT(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_uploSym), 0))
00122 #define diag_P(_x_) CHAR(STRING_ELT(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_diagSym), 0))
00123 #define class_P(_x_) CHAR(asChar(getAttrib(_x_, R_ClassSymbol)))

00125 /* should also work for "matrix" matrices: */
00126 #define Real_KIND(_x_)  (IS_S4_OBJECT(_x_) ? Real_kind(_x_) : \
00127                          (isReal(_x_) ? 0 : (isLogical(_x_) ? 1 : -1)))
00128 /* This one gives '0' also for integer "matrix" :*/
00129 #define Real_KIND2(_x_) (IS_S4_OBJECT(_x_) ? Real_kind(_x_) : \
00130                          (isLogical(_x_) ? 1 : 0))
00131 
00132 /* requires 'x' slot: */
00133 #define Real_kind(_x_)  (isReal(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_xSym)) ? 0 :       \
00134                          (isLogical(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_xSym)) ? 1 : -1))
00135 
00136 #define DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(__C_TYPE, __SEXP)        \
00137     __C_TYPE *xx = __SEXP(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym))

00148 static R_INLINE
00149 int packed_ncol(int len)
00150 {
00151     int disc = 8 * len + 1;     /* discriminant */
00152     int sqrtd = (int) sqrt((double) disc);
00153 
00154     if (len < 0 || disc != sqrtd * sqrtd)
00155         error(_("invalid 'len' = %d in packed_ncol"));
00156     return (sqrtd - 1)/2;
00157 }
00158 
00177 static R_INLINE
00178 SEXP ALLOC_SLOT(SEXP obj, SEXP nm, SEXPTYPE type, int length)
00179 {
00180     SEXP val = allocVector(type, length);
00181 
00182     SET_SLOT(obj, nm, val);
00183     return val;
00184 }
00185 
00196 static R_INLINE
00197 int* expand_cmprPt(int ncol, const int mp[], int mj[])
00198 {
00199     int j;
00200     for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00201         int j2 = mp[j+1], jj;
00202         for (jj = mp[j]; jj < j2; jj++) mj[jj] = j;
00203     }
00204     return mj;
00205 }
00206 
00214 static R_INLINE
00215 Rboolean any_NA(SEXP obj)
00216 {
00217     double *x = REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym));
00218     int i, n = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym));
00219     for(i=0; i < n; i++)
00220         if(ISNAN(x[i])) return TRUE;
00221     /* else */
00222     return FALSE;
00223 }

00242 static R_INLINE SEXP
00243 mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(SEXP A)
00244 {
00245     return strcmp(class_P(A), "dgeMatrix") ? dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(A) : A;
00246 }
00247 
00248 static R_INLINE SEXP
00249 mMatrix_as_geMatrix(SEXP A)
00250 {
00251     return strcmp(class_P(A) + 1, "geMatrix") ? dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix(A) : A;
00252 }
00253 
00263 static R_INLINE int
00264 Matrix_check_class(const char *class, char **valid)
00265 {
00266     int ans;
00267     for (ans = 0; ; ans++) {
00268         if (!strlen(valid[ans])) return -1;
00269         if (!strcmp(class, valid[ans])) return ans;
00270     }
00271 }
